column4: hiho, i would need some help, regarding fglrx+xserver-xorg+compiz/xgl, dri support worked before changing the default display to 1:0 for the compiz/xgl without any probs, but after this change fglrxinfo and any other tools are complaining that they can't connect to display 0:0, but X is starting and running on display 1:0 with "fglrx" in the device section
some more description would be helpful pls :)
thats where your going to get your answer if any
